name: Close Quarter Combat
description:
Use the objects in your surrounding to survive a zombie invasion!

Keyboard Controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Select Item - Space
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Throw - Left Click

Gamepad Controls

  • Move - Stick or D-pad
  • Select Item - Left Trigger
  • Aim - Right Stick
  • Throw - Right Trigger

Press § to fastforward 5 waves.

Music - Bass17w19CCBYRocavaco

Texture by Henry & Co. on Unsplash

I made a post jam version just after the game jam. The original version is in a zip-file for reference.
